title: Account Recovery
body: My long time friend who I have play with recently had his account hacked. His name is MagicalMayhem. He's sent emails to RIOT's support, but has yet to receive a reply from them. Is there anyway this can be fixed? He has been playing since beta and thats alot of time and money lost if he cant.

replies.body:
He'll need to remain patient while we get back to him. We've been pretty slammed with tickets lately, so response times are a bit longer than normal. 

We're not forgetting about him, though, so we'll have an account specialist reach out as soon as possible. Let me know if you have any other questions!
